chapter.title: Quick Start SCIRun Installation

sect1.para: This chapter is a quick installation checklist. See the next chapter SCIRun Installation and Build Instructions for more details.

orderedlist.listitem: Obtain the source trees for SCIRun and any desired packages.
Unzip the SCIRun source tree into a directory of your choosing.
Ensure that the target install machine matches the above system requirements.
Run configure from a directory of your choosing. The chosen directory will be referred to as BUILD_DIR from now on.
Run GNU make in the BUILD_DIR directory.
